description: Delicious, warm, and sweet—there's nothing quite like a bowl of Cinnamon Toast Crunch. How about experiencing this taste as a drink? That's right; using Fireball, Rumchata, and a bit of vanilla vodka can make a boozy treat that jogs your memory of your favorite childhood cereal.Fireball whiskey, RumChata, and vanilla&nbsp;vodka form a liquid trifecta of sorts, with each beverage bringing its own unique flavor to the drink. Here’s everything that you need to have and do to make it.
